# Craft Rod (Feat)
## Overview
You can create magic rods.

**Prerequisite:** Caster level 9th.

**Benefit:** You can create magic rods. Crafting a rod takes 1 day for each 1,000 gp in its base price. To craft a rod, you must use up raw materials costing half of its base price. See the magic item creation rules in Chapter 15 of the Core Rulebook 1) for more information.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 120
